field.name: ruleClass
field.remark: 0: common 1: free resource 2: accumulated reward's free resource 3: recurring fee

field.name: effectType
field.remark: 0: used it when product is effective 1: used it when product is expired

field.name: prorateType
field.remark: 0: non-discount 1: half cycle discount 2: calculate as per days or second
